1.ins_en: This bread after being left for a long time

2.ins_en: The plant in the image is blooming
2.explain_en: This is a rhododendron, usually, the flowers are pink or purple.

3.ins_en: What the creatures in the image look like when they grow up
3.explain_en: The creatures in the image are tadpoles, which grow up to be frogs.

4.ins_en: Symptoms of potassium deficiency in this leaf

5.ins_en: After the fruits in the image have been left for a period of time
5.explain_en: The apples will oxidize and turn yellow

6.ins_en: After the fruits in the image ripen
6.explain_en: This is a peach tree, and when ripe, it produces red peaches.

7.ins_en: Change after touching the leaves of the plant in the image with your hand
7.explain_en: The plant is a Mimosa pudica, and the leaves should contract and droop.

8.ins_en: Modify to the posture of a male dog marking territory
8.explain_en: A male dog will lift one leg to urinate

9.ins_en: Actions taken by animals in the image to beg for food
9.explain_en: The bird should open its mouth

10.ins_en: The appearance of an animal in a state of extreme alertness in the picture
10.explain_en: The cat should arch its body and have its fur standing on end

11.ins_en: The appearance of the animal in the image after storing food
11.explain_en: The hamster's cheek pouches should be bulging

12.ins_en: Change to the state of the plant at night in the image
12.explain_en: The plant is a water lily, and its flowers close at night.

13.ins_en: After the leaves in the image encounter pest infestation
13.explain_en: Holes will appear on the leaves, as they are eaten by the insects

14.ins_en: The action taken by the animal in the image to ward off predators
14.explain_en: The pangolin curls up into a ball

15.ins_en: Actions Taken by Animals in the Image to Avoid Danger
15.explain_en: A gecko should drop its tail.

16.ins_en: Actions Taken by Animals in the Image to Avoid Danger

17.ins_en: Appearance of a plant lacking water in the image
17.explain_en: The leaves will wilt and droop

18.explain_en: The egg should transform into a chick.

19.ins_en: Actions Taken by Animals in the Image to Attract Mates
19.explain_en: The Peacock should display their plumage

20.ins_en: Actions Taken by Animals in the Image to Attract Mates
20.explain_en: The frigatebird's red throat pouch inflates into a balloon

21.ins_en: Actions taken by the animal in the image to avoid danger
21.explain_en: The hedgehog curls up into a ball

22.ins_en: Actions taken by the animals in the image to avoid danger
22.explain_en: The Armadillo curls up into a ball

23.ins_en: The actions taken by the animals in the image to avoid danger
23.explain_en: The turtle should retract its head and limbs into its shell

24.ins_en: Cut the fruit shown in the image
24.explain_en: Cutting the watermelon reveals its red flesh.

25.ins_en: The appearance of this organism as a fully grown adult

26.ins_en: Modify the organism into an intermediate state between nymph and adult.

27.ins_en: What the fruit looks like when ripe in the picture

28.ins_en: The appearance of the fruit after it matures in the image

29.ins_en: The appearance of the fruit after it ripens in the picture

30.ins_en: The organism in the image makes changes to blend into the environment.
30.explain_en: The color of the chameleon should be similar to the background color.

31.ins_en: Restore the organism in the image to the fertilized egg state
31.explain_en: Transform back into a frog's fertilized egg.

32.ins_en: Modify this organism to regress into a nymph

33.ins_en: Return the organism in the picture to its juvenile state

34.ins_en: The organism in the image dissipates heat in hot weather
34.explain_en: The dog should stick out its tongue

35.ins_en: Modify to the appearance of this plant in full bloom

36.ins_en: Modify to show the plants in the image producing seeds
36.explain_en: Transform into a dandelion with white seeds.

37.ins_en: Modify to show the changes in the plant after catching insects in the image

38.ins_en: Changes in the animal's eyes in the image after facing strong light

39.ins_en: The appearance of the plant when mature in the image

40.ins_en: Open the nut in the image to reveal the kernel
40.explain_en: The macadamia nut reveals white nut meat

41.ins_en: Appearance of the fish in the image when calm
41.explain_en: The pufferfish deflates and no longer puffs up

42.ins_en: Modify the creature in the image to a defensive posture

43.ins_en: What the plant in the image looks like when it grows up
43.explain_en: The shoot has turned into a green bamboo

44.ins_en: Color Change When Planting the Plant in the Image into Acidic Soil

45.ins_en: Changes in the Fish When Encountering Danger in the Image

46.ins_en: Change the leaves in the image to an iron-deficient state.
46.explain_en: The plant color should turn yellow.

47.ins_en: Changes in the organism after albinism in the image

48.ins_en: Changes in Animal Fur After Entering Winter in the Picture
48.explain_en: The fur of the fox should turn white.

49.ins_en: Changes in Animal Fur After Entering Summer in the Image
49.explain_en: The fur of the fox should turn gray.

50.ins_en: Change the season in the image to autumn
50.explain_en: The maple leaves should turn red.

51.ins_en: Appearance of the sliced avocado after being left for an hour
51.explain_en: The flesh surface oxidizes and turns brown

52.ins_en: Show the grapes in the picture after sun‑drying
52.explain_en: The grapes shrink and become brown raisins

53.ins_en: Change the appearance of crab‑apple fruits when ripe
53.explain_en: The skins shift to bright red

54.ins_en: Appearance of the owl’s eyes in a dim environment
54.explain_en: Its pupils dilate, filling most of the iris

55.ins_en: Appearance of pine trees producing pollen in spring
55.explain_en: Yellow pollen forms on pine branches

56.ins_en: Male frog calling for mates at night
56.explain_en: Its vocal sac beneath the throat inflates

57.explain_en: The lead wolf raises its head and howls

58.explain_en: The hamster curls up, eyes closed

59.ins_en: Heat the corn kernels in the picture until they pop
59.explain_en: The kernels turn into white fluffy popcorn

60.ins_en: Plumage of the grey juvenile flamingo in the image when adult
60.explain_en: Feathers change from grey to pink

61.ins_en: Open the seed in the image
61.explain_en: Green spiny husk opens, revealing glossy brown nuts

62.ins_en: Modify the animal in the picture to its roosting posture
62.explain_en: It hangs upside‑down, wings wrapped around its body

63.ins_en: Show the plant in the picture in its daytime open state
63.explain_en: Petals fully spread, revealing yellow stamens

64.ins_en: Show the hummingbird's hovering posture more dynamically while feeding
64.explain_en: The hummingbird hovers in front of the flower, wings blurred into a fan shape

65.ins_en: Show the plant's leaves 30 minutes after being touched
65.explain_en: The plant in the image is a Mimosa, and the leaflets reopen and lie flat again

66.ins_en: Show the animal in the image in its summer coat
66.explain_en: The animal in the image is snowshoe hares, and the fur changes from pure white to mottled brown-grey

67.ins_en: Put the animal's favorite food in the image
67.explain_en: The animal in the image is a squirrel, and you can put nuts like pine cones, walnuts, peanuts, etc.

68.ins_en: Show oxygen release during vigorous photosynthesis of algae
68.explain_en: Tiny bubbles form on the aquatic plant leaves
